title: Home
top:
This website aggregates and compares expert evaluations for {count} Italian wines over the years 2017-2023. You can read about the inner workings in the FAQ section.

Individual wines can be searched from the top search form or by navigating the DOCG, DOC, Varieties and Regional lists.
body:
In the current version, the website is just a web interface to the AGReATWine database, many features and disabled or not working.

For any question, use the GitHub public repo
